body:
Comment 2 by **jonas@pfenniger.name**: 
I don't know if it's related but I just used a pre-compiled go program and it showed the
same issue ; no termination, no Ctrl-C or Ctrl-Z support. The binary is downloadable in
this package: 
http://cloud.github.com/downloads/jmhodges/jsonpp/jsonpp-1.0.0-osx-x86_64.zip
